5. **Row 4**: Year 1985, same as Row 3 but with a different entrant name and chassis version (Spirit 101d). Still not Alfa Romeo.

I should also consider if there's any mention of other drivers or teams associated with Alfa Romeo in those years, but looking at the entrant names, only Marlboro Team Alfa Romeo appears, which likely includes Mauro Baldi as part of their team. So, that single entry supports the claim.
